resources.string:
● Now you can share any link from external apps on your PC through Sched.
● Suppose you want to open a link from Notes app to PC.
● All you have to do is click on the link and select Open on PC option.
● Navigate to https://web-sched.web.app.
● Log in with the same mobile number (one-time step) if you have not already logged in.
● Sched will automatically redirect you to the shared link.
